cppcoreguidelines-non-private-member-var.description:
Description

The
cppcoreguidelines-non-private-member-variables-in-classes
check is
an alias, please see
misc-non-private-member-variables-in-classes
for more information.
cppcoreguidelines-non-private-member-var.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
